results.summary: Power Density improvement demonstrated on a certified engine
results.content: Power Density improvement demonstrated on a certified engine

descriptionByte:
Scope:

The purpose is to increase the power density from a state of the art engine by introduction of adequate technologies for which TRL 6 is targeted.

To increase the power output/reduce weight, engine parts design could be modified (as crankcase with unit pumps, cylinders/sleeves, cylinders head, rod, bearing...) using alternative materials (High characteristics Aluminium, Titanium…). Alternative manufacturing process may be studied.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
           Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

Please remember that an Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed. See the comments in the Excel table.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened during the first days of the week commencing 26 January 2015.

"},{"approvalDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:58:22 PM","lastChangeDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:57:59 PM","content":"

On 21 January the templates for drafting Part B.I and Part B.II of the proposals were uploaded to the information package of this call. 
An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

results.summary: High Performance Turbocharger
results.content: High Performance Turbocharger

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Participation to the development of a high performance aeronautical turbocharger with high pressure ration/flow rate, low maintenance, and reasonable cost. This equipment could integrate the at most state of the art of the already available elements into aeronautical certificable product.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
             Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

Please remember that an Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed. See the comments in the Excel table.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened during the first days of the week commencing 26 January 2015.

"},{"approvalDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:58:22 PM","lastChangeDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:57:59 PM","content":"

On 21 January the templates for drafting Part B.I and Part B.II of the proposals were uploaded to the information package of this call. 
An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

  • FRC-02-03
  • FRC-02-05
  • FRC-02-06
  • FRC-02-07
  • FRC-02-08
"}]

results.summary: Alternative Architecture Engine research
results.content: Alternative Architecture Engine research

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Very High Power density engine Research, targetting a power density of 2.5 KW/kg for dry engine, with a specific fuel burn of 215 g/kWh.The project aims to develop new technologies that enable a piston engine to reach such a power density never achieved before.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

On 26 January 2015 the link for the ethics review was added to the PartB templates and the comment concerning the definative version being in the submission system was removed.
Please remember that an Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed. See the comments in the Excel table.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened during the first days of the week commencing 26 January 2015.

"},{"approvalDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:58:22 PM","lastChangeDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:57:59 PM","content":"

On 21 January the templates for drafting Part B.I and Part B.II of the proposals were uploaded to the information package of this call. 
An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

  • FRC-02-03
  • FRC-02-05
  • FRC-02-06
  • FRC-02-07
  • FRC-02-08
"}]

results.summary: Engine Installation Optimization
results.content: Engine Installation Optimization

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Aircraft Installation optimisation studies in order to improve the global powerplant performance (cooling optimisation, compactness and drag reduction, and global weight savings).  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
           Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

results.summary: Support to the aerodynamic and aeroelastic analysis of a trimmed, complete compound R/C and related issues
results.content: Support to the aerodynamic and aeroelastic analysis of a trimmed, complete compound R/C and related issues

keywords: AER Aerodynamics of External and Removable items
descriptionByte:
Scope:

Within the Digital Wind Tunnel activity line of the Fast RotorCraft IADP the selected partner is asked to support the topic leader, from predevelopment until demonstrator first flight, in performing trimmed, free flight complete rotorcraft simulations accounting for complex aerodynamic and aeroelastic phenomena.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

results.summary: Aerodynamic and functional design study of a full-fairing semi-watertight concept for an articulated rotor head
results.content: Aerodynamic and functional design study of a full-fairing semi-watertight concept for an articulated rotor head

keywords: AER Aerodynamics of External and Removable items
descriptionByte:
Scope:

Within the Lifting Rotor activity line of the Fast RotorCraft IADP the selected partner is asked to support the topic leader, from predevelopment until demonstrator first flight, in performing aerodynamic and functional design study of a full-fairing semi-watertight concept for an articulated rotor head hub fairing.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules

On 26 January 2015 the link for the ethics review was added to the PartB templates and the comment concerning the definative version being in the submission system was removed.
Please remember that an Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed. See the comments in the Excel table.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened during the first days of the week commencing 26 January 2015.

"},{"approvalDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:58:22 PM","lastChangeDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:57:59 PM","content":"

On 21 January the templates for drafting Part B.I and Part B.II of the proposals were uploaded to the information package of this call. 
An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

  • FRC-02-03
  • FRC-02-05
  • FRC-02-06
  • FRC-02-07
  • FRC-02-08
"}]

results.summary: Support to the aerodynamic analysis and design of propellers of a compound helicopter
results.content: Support to the aerodynamic analysis and design of propellers of a compound helicopter

keywords: AER Aerodynamics of External and Removable items
descriptionByte:
Scope:

The selected partner is asked to compute with CFD method the performance (power and thrust as function of pitch angle, airspeed and speed of rotation) and aerodynamic control loads of propellers of a compound helicopter. Local parameters (angles of attack, airspeed Mach number) as function of radius and chord will be analyzed.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

results.summary: Tools development for aerodynamic optimization on engine air intake
results.content: Tools development for aerodynamic optimization on engine air intake

keywords: AER Aerodynamics of External and Removable items
descriptionByte:
Scope:

Within the Digital Wind Tunnel activity line of the Fast RotorCraft IADP the selected partner is asked to support the topic leader to set up a workflow dedicated to engine air inlet aerodynamic optimization. This workflow will be used to define the next generation of rotorcraft engine air inlets.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

On 21 January the templates for drafting Part B.I and Part B.II of the proposals were uploaded to the information package of this call. 
An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

  • FRC-02-05

results.summary: HVDC Starter/Generator
results.content: HVDC Starter/Generator

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Objective: to develop up to TRL6 a High Voltage Direct Current (HVDC) controlled Starter/Generator (S/G) intended to be installed on the LifeCraft helicopter for Demonstration in flight.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules

On 26 January 2015 the link for the ethics review was added to the PartB templates and the comment concerning the definative version being in the submission system was removed.
Please remember that an Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed. See the comments in the Excel table.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened during the first days of the week commencing 26 January 2015.

"},{"approvalDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:58:22 PM","lastChangeDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:57:59 PM","content":"

On 21 January the templates for drafting Part B.I and Part B.II of the proposals were uploaded to the information package of this call. 
An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

  • FRC-02-03
  • FRC-02-05
  • FRC-02-06
  • FRC-02-07
  • FRC-02-08
"}]

results.summary: High Voltage Network Battery
results.content: High Voltage Network Battery

descriptionByte:
Scope:

The work consists of design, development, manufacturing, qualification and support of a prototype battery for flight tests. This battery is connected to a helicopter high voltage electrical network and used for pre-flight power supply and starting.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

results.summary: Power Conversion
results.content: Power Conversion

descriptionByte:
Scope:

The work consists of design, development, manufacturing, qualification and support prior flight tests of power conversion equipment dedicated to be embedded on board of the life craft helicopter.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

results.summary: HVDC Network management
results.content: HVDC Network management

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Partner shall design and develop a HVDC electrical master box (HVEMB) for the Cleansky 2 helicopter demonstrator. The partner shall support the integration of this equipment into the helicopters system rigs, prior to perform flight tests in the aircraft.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals". 
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules

On 26 January 2015 the link for the ethics review was added to the PartB templates and the comment concerning the definative version being in the submission system was removed.
Please remember that an Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed. See the comments in the Excel table.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened during the first days of the week commencing 26 January 2015.

"},{"approvalDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:58:22 PM","lastChangeDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:57:59 PM","content":"

On 21 January the templates for drafting Part B.I and Part B.II of the proposals were uploaded to the information package of this call. 
An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

  • FRC-02-03
  • FRC-02-05
  • FRC-02-06
  • FRC-02-07
  • FRC-02-08
"}]

results.summary: OPEN ROTOR Engine Mounting System
results.content: OPEN ROTOR Engine Mounting System

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Design , manufacture , assembly and instrumentation of mounts for CROR  Flight Test Demo; Mounts for characterization and flight ability validation through Partials tests :  manufacture , assembly and instrumentation ,  mechanical  tests of this set of mounts. Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

results.summary: Support to future CROR and UHBR propulsion system maturation
results.content: Support to future CROR and UHBR propulsion system maturation

descriptionByte:
Scope:

This topic consists in a wide scope of activities contributing to the maturation of future CROR and UHBR propulsion system integration from TRL3 to TRL6. The main areas of activities are related to aerodynamic and acoustic, wind tunnel and flight tests as well as structure impacts and materials. Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment
