results.summary: Development of advanced laser-beam welding technology for the manufacturing of structures for titanium HLFC structures
results.content: Development of advanced laser-beam welding technology for the manufacturing of structures for titanium HLFC structures

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Development of process and system technology for reproducible laser welding and straightening of titanium structures for Hybrid Laminar Flow Technology (HLFC) structures on the basis of a process modell for welding an straightening, including 3D deformation and residual stress prediction. Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules

On 26 January 2015 the link for the ethics review was added to the PartB templates and the comment concerning the definative version being in the submission system was removed.
Please remember that an Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed. See the comments in the Excel table.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened during the first days of the week commencing 26 January 2015.

"},{"approvalDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:58:22 PM","lastChangeDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:57:59 PM","content":"

On 21 January the templates for drafting Part B.I and Part B.II of the proposals were uploaded to the information package of this call. 
An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

  • FRC-02-03
  • FRC-02-05
  • FRC-02-06
  • FRC-02-07
  • FRC-02-08
"}]

results.summary: Cost Reduction On Composite Structure Assembly – Blind fastener inspection technology for quality control
results.content: Cost Reduction On Composite Structure Assembly – Blind fastener inspection technology for quality control

descriptionByte:
Scope:

The expected outcomes are the definition, development and prototype realization of an innovative inspection monitoring process for specific and complex high strength blind fasteners that pose a challenge in terms of online process monitoring in typical aerospace assembly application.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

results.summary: Cost Reduction On Composite Structure Assembly - Definition And Development Of An Inspection Tool To Characterize Inner Surface Hole Quality
results.content: Cost Reduction On Composite Structure Assembly - Definition And Development Of An Inspection Tool To Characterize Inner Surface Hole Quality

descriptionByte:
Scope:

The objective of this work is to define a relevant criteria which is relevant to characterize the surface quality and which could be industrially controlled to characterise the inner surface of the hole.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template  (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

results.summary: Rapid Assembly Of Bracket For Structure-System Integration
results.content: Rapid Assembly Of Bracket For Structure-System Integration

descriptionByte:
Scope:

This specific WP is orientated to development, assessment and selection of integrative concepts, which will be completed by specific technologies development to optimize assembly and integration of elementary parts, sub-components and modules.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
           Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules

On 26 January 2015 the link for the ethics review was added to the PartB templates and the comment concerning the definative version being in the submission system was removed.
Please remember that an Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed. See the comments in the Excel table.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened during the first days of the week commencing 26 January 2015.

"},{"approvalDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:58:22 PM","lastChangeDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:57:59 PM","content":"

On 21 January the templates for drafting Part B.I and Part B.II of the proposals were uploaded to the information package of this call. 
An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

  • FRC-02-03
  • FRC-02-05
  • FRC-02-06
  • FRC-02-07
  • FRC-02-08
"}]

results.summary: Automation in Final Aircraft Assembly Lines and Enabling Technologies
results.content: Automation in Final Aircraft Assembly Lines and Enabling Technologies

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Development of automation concepts and technologies to radically increase the use of automation systems in Aircraft Section Assembly (MCA) and Aircraft Final Assembly (FAL) including concepts for realization of industry 4.0 approach. Linked to JTP chapter 6.6 (2.2.3).  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

results.summary: Environmental Friendly Fire Suppression
results.content: Environmental Friendly Fire Suppression

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Design, development, and testing of an environmental friendly fire suppression system for aircraft cargo holds. Proof of fire suppression performance against applicable performance standards.

Demonstration of fire suppressant distribution and agent hold time. Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
           Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

results.summary: Development of Thermoelastic Stress Analysis for the detection of stress hotspots during structural testing
results.content: Development of Thermoelastic Stress Analysis for the detection of stress hotspots during structural testing

keywords: SMT Structures behaviour and Material Testing
descriptionByte:
Scope:

The objective is to prove the feasibility of applying Thermoelastic-Stress Analysis in a structural test environment for detecting stress hotspots. The detection and quantification of localised stress will help to reduce the product development time, risk and cost. Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.

On 26 January 2015 the link for the ethics review was added to the PartB templates and the comment concerning the definative version being in the submission system was removed.
Please remember that an Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed. See the comments in the Excel table.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened during the first days of the week commencing 26 January 2015.

"},{"approvalDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:58:22 PM","lastChangeDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:57:59 PM","content":"

On 21 January the templates for drafting Part B.I and Part B.II of the proposals were uploaded to the information package of this call. 
An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

  • FRC-02-03
  • FRC-02-05
  • FRC-02-06
  • FRC-02-07
  • FRC-02-08
"}]

results.summary: Process and Methods for E2E Maintenance Architecture development and demonstrations and solutions for technology integration
results.content: Process and Methods for E2E Maintenance Architecture development and demonstrations and solutions for technology integration

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Provide Methods for Integrated Health Monitoring and Management System Design, Performance optimization and the overall Architecture evaluation (methods, simulation solutions, collaborative framework for demonstration purposes). Development of integrated structure health monitoring solution as condition based maintenance enabler.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
     Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

results.summary: Aircraft System Prognostic solutions integrated into an airline E2E maintenance operational context
results.content: Aircraft System Prognostic solutions integrated into an airline E2E maintenance operational context

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Demonstration of system health monitoring and prognostic architectures (on-board/on-ground solutions) for selected system use cases (e.g. APU, pneumatic and electrical power generation system) for large passenger aircrafts. Demonstration of specific prognostic solutions (e.g. data processing, failure mode identification, prognostic algorithm, degradation models, etc.) and its integration into the overall Integrated Health Monitoring Management System. Development and demonstration of the efficiency of augmented reality based maintenance tools making use of information as provided by the integrated health monitoring system is addressed. Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

results.summary: Airline Maintenance Operations implementation of an E2E Maintenance Service Architecture and its enablers
results.content: Airline Maintenance Operations implementation of an E2E Maintenance Service Architecture and its enablers

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Multidisciplinary Integration and real-life operational demonstration of E2E Maintenance Services Architecture, enabling effective cooperation between OEMs, suppliers, airlines and MROs featuring solutions with focus on mixed legacy fleet maintenance operations, technology enablers for Integrated Health Monitoring Management solution based on prognostics, maintenance planning and optimization, remote support and maintenance mobile tools/applications and its seamless integration in the existing maintenance operations landscape (incl. MIS  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents"))
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
           Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents

On 26 January 2015 the link for the ethics review was added to the PartB templates and the comment concerning the definative version being in the submission system was removed.
Please remember that an Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed. See the comments in the Excel table.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened during the first days of the week commencing 26 January 2015.

"},{"approvalDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:58:22 PM","lastChangeDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:57:59 PM","content":"

On 21 January the templates for drafting Part B.I and Part B.II of the proposals were uploaded to the information package of this call. 
An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

  • FRC-02-03
  • FRC-02-05
  • FRC-02-06
  • FRC-02-07
  • FRC-02-08
"}]

results.summary: Aerodynamic characterization of control devices for wing loads control and aircraft response characterization of a regional turboprop aircraft
results.content: Aerodynamic characterization of control devices for wing loads control and aircraft response characterization of a regional turboprop aircraft

descriptionByte:
Scope:

The calculation, analysis and prediction of the aerodynamics of control surface devices installed in a turboprop regional aircraft taking into account elastic effects in conjunction with other innovative devices. These controls are devoted to perform loads control on wing and therefore the wing loads and the aircraft response are the top objectives pursued.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

results.summary: Smart Integrated Wing – Life extended hydrostatic & lubricated systems
results.content: Smart Integrated Wing – Life extended hydrostatic & lubricated systems

descriptionByte:
Scope:

The partner will work on equipment and processes extending the life of lubricated components such as gear boxes and spindle for Electro Mechanical Actuators (EMA), and high pressure hydraulic components such as Electro-Hydrostatic Actuators (EHA). This should happen through the use of innovative sealing technologies and sensor techniques and by associated methods.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.Work Programme.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
     Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

results.summary: Modular, scalable, multi-function, high power density power controller for electric taxi
results.content: Modular, scalable, multi-function, high power density power controller for electric taxi

descriptionByte:
Scope:

This project will develop a next generation power controller for electric taxi. This controller shall feature increased power density, bidirectional power conversion, modularity, scalability, and multi-functionality to support wide range of aircraft applications. Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
     Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation
    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules

On 26 January 2015 the link for the ethics review was added to the PartB templates and the comment concerning the definative version being in the submission system was removed.
Please remember that an Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed. See the comments in the Excel table.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened during the first days of the week commencing 26 January 2015.

"},{"approvalDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:58:22 PM","lastChangeDate":"Jan 21, 2015 7:57:59 PM","content":"

On 21 January the templates for drafting Part B.I and Part B.II of the proposals were uploaded to the information package of this call. 
An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

  • FRC-02-03
  • FRC-02-05
  • FRC-02-06
  • FRC-02-07
  • FRC-02-08
"}]

results.summary: Robust package for harsh environment and optimization of electrical characteristic of rectifier bridge using high current diode
results.content: Robust package for harsh environment and optimization of electrical characteristic of rectifier bridge using high current diode

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Electrical components need to meet harsher aircraft requirements; mechanical constraints combined with high temperature conditions weaken the die and the packaging of the component. The target is to develop a robust diode package (high reliability) based on an optimized die. The diode component performances shall meet electrical and environmental constraints for a harsh environment. The foreseen application is a high current rectifier leg and/or full bridge operating in harsh mechanical, thermal and fluid constraints.  Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
           Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment

On 21 January the templates for drafting Part B.I and Part B.II of the proposals were uploaded to the information package of this call. 
An Excel version of the tables which are embedded in Part B.I is also available in case needed.
The submission system for uploading the completed templates will be opened in due course.

Please note that on 12 Janaury 2015 there were significant updates made to the following topic descriptions. Please see the new version of the Annex III (Topic Documents Document) for details.

results.summary: Smart Oil pressure sensors for oil cooled starter/generator
results.content: Smart Oil pressure sensors for oil cooled starter/generator

descriptionByte:
Scope:

Development and test of a smart oil pressure sensor technology that will have to operate in harsh environment (temperature, pressure, vibration …). This sensor will have to integrate” Health Monitoring” capability in order to allow failures detection and prediction.   Please refer for the full and formal topic description to Annex III of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015 Amendment nr. 1  Version 3 (see under the tab "Topic Conditions and Documents")
additionalInfos:
{"additionalInfo":"

The Model Implimentation Agreement Document was added to this web site on 13th March 2015.
The 3rd and final release of the Questions & Answers Document was uploaded on 12 Match 2015.
Both documents can be found by Clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

To download any document from the list in the "Call Documents" section just click on the "EN" link after the document name.

Important updates were made to this call on 13th February 2015. 

An update to the CS2 JU Workplan 2014-2015.

An update to the Full Description of Topics (ANNEX III)

You can find these documents by clicking on the "Call Documents" tab above this text.

"}
supportInfo:
Clean Sky 2 Helpdesk:  Info-Call-CFP-2014-01@Cleansky.EU

Participant Portal FAQ – Submission of proposals

National Contact Points (NCP)

Enterprise Europe Network – national contact points' advice to businesses with focus on SMEs. The support includes guidance on the EU research funding.

Clean Sky 2 National Contact Points - Clean Sky 2 JU States Representative Group

Research Enquiry Service – ask questions about any aspect of European research and EU R&I programmes

IT Helpdesk – contact the IT helpdesk for questions such as forgotten passwords, access rights and roles, technical aspects of submission of proposals, etc.

Ethics – for compliance with ethical issues, see the Participant Portal and Science and Society Portal

European IPR Helpdesk assists you on intellectual property issues

The European Charter for Researchers and the Code of Conduct for their recruitment

CEN and CENELEC, the European Standards Organisations, advise you how to tackle standardisation in your project proposal. Contact CEN-CENELEC Research Helpdesk at research@cencenelec.eu.

Partner Search Services help you find a partner organisation for your proposal

H2020 Online Manual your online guide on the procedures from proposal submission to managing your grant
sepTemplate:
To access the Electronic Submission Service of the topic, please select the type of action that is most relevant to your proposal from the list below and click on the 'Start Submission' button. You will then be asked to confirm your choice of the type of action, the topic for the call, as these cannot be changed subsequently in the submission system. Upon confirmation you will be linked to the correct entry point.

To access existing draft proposals for this topic, please login to the Participant Portal and select the My Proposals page of the My Area section.
topicConditions:
Please read carefully all provisions below before the preparation of your application.

  1. List of countries and applicable rules for funding: described in part A of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  2. Eligibility and admissibility conditions: described in part B & C of the general Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
    Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.
     
  3. Evaluation

    3.1  Evaluation criteria and procedure, scoring and threshold: described in part F of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 Work Plan 2014-2015.
            Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014/2015.

    3.2 Guide to the submission and evaluation process: described in the document "Rules for submission, evaluation, selection, award and review procedures of Calls for Proposals".
     
  4. Proposal page limits and layout: Please refer to Part B of the standard proposal template (to be published before end of January 2015).
     
  5. Indicative timetable for evaluation and grant agreement:
    Signature of grant agreements: maximum 8 months from the date of closure of the call.
     
  6. Provisions, proposal templates and evaluation forms for the type(s) of action(s) under this topic:
    The proposal templates will be available in the submission system (SEP).
     
  7. Additional provisions:
    Clean Sky 2 Budget Flexibility:
    See Part G of the General Annexes of the Clean Sky 2 JU Work Plan 2014-2015.
     
  8.  JTIs additional documents
    Clean Sky 2 Joint Technical Programme
    Clean Sky 2 JU Financial Rules
    Clean Sky 2 JU Regulation of establishment
